## BasicTool.addListenerCallback() method

Add a Zotero event listener callback

**Signature:**

```typescript
addListenerCallback<T extends keyof ListenerCallbackMap>(type: T, callback: ListenerCallbackMap[T]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | T | Event type |
|  callback | ListenerCallbackMap\[T\] | Event callback |

**Returns:**

void
